abstract: The public will get a say in adding a number of categories to the People’s Choice Awards.
snippet: The public will get a say in adding a number of categories to the People’s Choice Awards.
lead_paragraph: The People’s Choice Awards, sponsored by Procter & Gamble, is giving the public a chance to select additional categories to honor favorites in movies, television and music.

headline.main: People’s Choice Awards Will Give More Choices
